A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I consider myself a fan. Grew up on Star Wars. Earliest memory is seeing the first Star Wars in the theater. The ridiculous fanboy culture that has derided the prequels and resulted in hatred\, name calling\, and heinous online behavior needs to get over itself. I did not love the movie. It will not live with me like A New Hope and Empire. But it was enjoyable and visually stunning. My children loved it. It is not perfect but I was glad that it did not remake am earlier film like The Force Awakens did.
